title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and document functional and non-functional requirements. This task includes creating a comprehensive plan for the project timeline, resources, budget, and milestones, with a focus on ensuring the platform's scalability, security, and usability. Additionally, this task involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather inputs and ensure alignment. The RFC is now in the REVIEW state, awaiting feedback from the assigned architect and other relevant stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design for LeadershipChallengeSimulator
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including the application's components, data flow, and integration points. Define the technology stack and development approach. Consider aspects such as scalability, maintainability, modularity, security, performance optimization, and ensure the design supports the gamification aspects of the platform and can handle real-world business scenarios.

**Additional Considerations:**
1. Implement a microservices architecture to allow for easier scaling and maintenance.
2. Utilize containerization technology (e.g., Docker) for efficient deployment and management.
3. Design with RESTful APIs to enable seamless integration between components and third-party services.
4. Consider implementing server-side rendering for better performance and user experience.
5. Integrate real-time data processing capabilities (like WebSockets or GraphQL Subscriptions) for dynamic updates in the gamified environment.
6. Investigate using a modern frontend technology stack for improved user interface and interactivity, prioritizing frameworks that support AI/ML integration for enhanced gamification.
7. Research and consider implementing AI/ML techniques to enhance the gamified learning experience.
8. Explore utilizing NoSQL databases for handling real-time data processing requirements and scalability.
9. Investigate using a DevOps approach with tools like Jenkins, Ansible, or Terraform for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment.
10. Consider implementing unit testing and automated acceptance testing to ensure code quality and system robustness.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, challenge scenarios, and other application data. Ensure data integrity, security, and scalability.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side components, including APIs, business logic, and integration with external services. Implement authentication, authorization, and data access layers.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and interactive components for the gamified platform. Ensure a seamless and engaging user experience.

title: Challenge Scenario Design and Development
description: Design and develop realistic business challenge scenarios, including branching paths based on user decisions. Ensure diversity and relevance of challenges.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure the application meets quality standards and requirements.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards. Conduct security audits and penetration testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring systems. Automate the build, testing, and deployment processes. Ensure scalability and high availability.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, administrators, and developers. Establish user support channels and knowledge base.
